metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13173 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
fstream before 1.0.12 is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Overwrite. Extractingtarballs containing a hardlink to a file that already exists in the system,and a file that matches the hardlink, will overwrite the system's file withthe contents of the extracted file. The fstream.DirWriter() function isvulnerable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13173` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-fstream - 1.0.10-1ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: node-fstream package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.10-1ubuntu0.18.04.1').
